text.section:
The Secretary shall provide a copy of this subtitle:
To the extent possible, to every person who in this State manufactures or sells, at wholesale or retail, any frozen dessert or mix for a frozen dessert; and
To any person who requests it.

The Secretary may:
Publish summaries of judgments, decrees, or court orders issued under this subtitle; and
Otherwise collect, report, or illustrate the results of any investigation conducted under this subtitle.
